translations: n．三部曲：由三部作品组成的系列，通常是小说、电影或戏剧，它们之间有紧密的主题或情节联系。
· The Lord of the Rings is one of the most famous trilogies in literature.
《指环王》是文学史上最著名的三部曲之一。

sentences.sentence: When you're not answering research questions, do you moonlight as an elf in the JRR trilogies?
sentences.translation: 当你不回答问题的研究，你作为一个小精灵在月光堆三部曲？

sentences.sentence: The series consists of three 'Chronicles', the first two are trilogies and the last is a tetralogy (the final book will be published in 2013).
sentences.translation: 该系列包括三个“编年史”，前两个是三部曲，最后一个是四部曲(最后一部将于2013年出版)。
